price: (20) They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā sururin maṣfūfatin wazawwajnāhum biḥūrin ʿīnin
